channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WANotifier
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WANotifier

item.title: CVE-2024-6165|2024-07-31T13:58:59.116Z -- unknown -- wanotifier
item.description: The WANotifier WordPress plugin before 2.6.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-6165|2024-07-31T06:00:02.242Z -- unknown -- wanotifier
item.description: The WANotifier WordPress plugin before 2.6.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
